install.name: TCImageSlider
install.author: Tobacamp-Dani Gunawan
install.description: Displays sliding images based on default Joomla! banner component (com_banners)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Image Category (based on category in com_banners)

param.name: slidespeed
param.label: Speed
param.description: Specify the slider's slide speed (larger is faster 1-10)

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Background color
param.description: Configure background color. Leave it empty if you'd like to make it no color.

param.name: imagegap
param.label: Image gap
param.description: Specify gap between each image (in space)

param.name: slideshowgap
param.label: Slideshow gap
param.description: Specify pixels gap between each slideshow rotation (in integer)
